vsParam:
Ah, [px], you guys!
I didn't expect to see you here...

Ah, Head Bill Berry. Long time no see.
You're in Ateria for travel?

Yeah. Actually, I was born in Ateria.
An acquaintance wrote to me and asked me to come here.
Oh... Bill Berry, you got any trouble?

You're short of something on the road?
If so, [px] can make it for you!

Really!?
I happen to have run out of vulneraries...

That will be a great help if you can make some for me.
The price of commodities in Ateria is way too high.

Thank you, [px].
Thank you so much.

Um... After all, the rising price is reasonable as the ore production
has significantly dropped compared to when I lived here.
Thank you, [px], for making some vulneraries for me.
